Weekend vibes

Saturday, July 10, 2021

Her Summer break started yesterday, and as always it is an event. I am so excited about getting everything right that I mostly present as a frantic killjoy. Jeopardy makes everything better.

I start today with my usual bike route past the bakeries. Niemeijer for pain au choc and canel√©s, followed by tiger buns and krentenbollen at Simon Meijssen. Niemeijer won best croissant of Amsterdam, but I think they‚Äôre too bready.

In the window of Meijssen they‚Äôre showcasing pride muffins. Neither of us likes muffins, but I buy two anyway. They‚Äôre surprisingly good.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
